title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Whiting K, Martin , Arora (2022). cbioportalR: R package access data cBioPortal. R package version 0.1.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {cbioportalR: An R package to access data on cBioPortal},   author = {Karissa Whiting and Axel Martin and Arshi Arora},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.0}, }

what: An R package to access data on cBioPortal
title: An R package to access data on cBioPortal
text: {cbioportalR} allows access cBioPortal’s genomic clinical data directly R. package wraps cBioPortal’s existing API endpoints R R users can easily leverage cBioPortal’s API. Using functions, can access genomic data mutations, copy number alterations fusions well data tumor mutational burden (TMB), microsatellite instability status (MSI) select clinical data points (depending study). package created work public cBioPortal website, well MSK’s private institutional cbioportal database. connect private database, must first get access token (whatever credentials institution requires) supply specific API url beginning session (details ). information cBioPortal, see following publications: Gao et al. Sci. Signal. 2013 Cerami et al. Cancer Discov. 2012 full documentation cBioPortal API, please see following links: cBioPortal API API Clients documentation full reference documentation API

title: An R package to access data on cBioPortal
text: can install development version {cbioportalR} :
code: remotes::install_github("karissawhiting/cbioportalR")

title: An R package to access data on cBioPortal
text: using public domain https://www.cbioportal.org/, need token access data. using private instance cbioportal (like MSK’s institutional database), need acquire token save .Renviron file (wherever store credentials). Simply log institution’s cbioportal website, acquire token (Usually ‘Web API’ tab) save .Renviron file. save token environmental variable hard code secret key scripts. Tip: following {usethis} function can easily find open .Renviron : Paste token given (using format ) .Renviron file save file changes. may want save restart R session ensure token saved recognized. can test token saved using: reiterate, planning retrieve data using public cBioPortal, need token. need access data institutional cBioPortal page must get token first. Note: MSK researcher working IMPACT, connect MSK’s cBioPortal instance get date IMPACT data, must follow MSK-IMPACT publication guidelines using data
code: usethis::edit_r_environ() CBIOPORTAL_TOKEN = 'YOUR_TOKEN' library(cbioportalR) get_cbioportal_token()

title: An R package to access data on cBioPortal
text: every new R session, need set database URL. get_cbioportal_db() function set environmental variable session tells package database point API calls. can set point public database shortcut: can set specific institution database :
code: library(cbioportalR) get_cbioportal_db("public") get_cbioportal_db("<<your institution's url>>/api")

title: An R package to access data on cBioPortal
text: ’ve set preferred db connection, can pull data via study ID sample ID. see available studies (depends cBioPortal database connected ), can use: pull mutation data particular study ID can use:
code: get_studies() %>% head(n = 10) #> # A tibble: 10 x 13 #>    name     shortName  description     publicStudy pmid  citation  groups status #>    <chr>    <chr>      <chr>           <lgl>       <chr> <chr>     <chr>   <int> #>  1 Oral Sq… Head & ne… Comprehensive … TRUE        2361… Pickerin… ""          0 #>  2 Hepatoc… HCC (Inse… Whole-exome se… TRUE        2582… Schulze … "PUBL…      0 #>  3 Uveal M… UM (QIMR)  Whole-genome o… TRUE        2668… Johansso… "PUBL…      0 #>  4 Neurobl… NBL (AMC)  Whole genome s… TRUE        2236… Molenaar… "PUBL…      0 #>  5 Nasopha… NPC (Sing… Whole exome se… TRUE        2495… Lin et a… "PUBL…      0 #>  6 Neurobl… NBL (Colo… Whole-genome s… TRUE        2646… Peifer e… ""          0 #>  7 Myelody… MDS (Toky… Whole exome se… TRUE        2190… Yoshida … ""          0 #>  8 Insulin… Panet (Sh… Whole exome se… TRUE        2432… Cao et a… ""          0 #>  9 Pleural… PLMESO (N… Whole-exome se… TRUE        2548… Guo et a… ""          0 #> 10 Pilocyt… PAST (Nat… Whole-genome s… TRUE        2381… Jones et… "PUBL…      0 #> # … with 5 more variables: importDate <chr>, allSampleCount <int>, #> #   studyId <chr>, cancerTypeId <chr>, referenceGenome <chr> # As a result you will get a list of dataframes of 1) mutation + fusion and 2) cna. df <- get_genetics(study_id = "nbl_amc_2012",                    mutations = TRUE,                     cna = FALSE,                     fusions = TRUE)  mutations <- df$mut  df %>% head() #> $mut #> # A tibble: 562 x 31 #>    uniqueSampleKey  uniquePatientKey molecularProfil… Tumor_Sample_Ba… patientId #>    <chr>            <chr>            <chr>            <chr>            <chr>     #>  1 TjU5NVQ6bmJsX2F… TjU5NTpuYmxfYW1… nbl_amc_2012_mu… N595T            N595      #>  2 TjYwOFQ6bmJsX2F… TjYwODpuYmxfYW1… nbl_amc_2012_mu… N608T            N608      #>  3 TjcxOFQ6bmJsX2F… TjcxODpuYmxfYW1… nbl_amc_2012_mu… N718T            N718      #>  4 TjU3MlQ6bmJsX2F… TjU3MjpuYmxfYW1… nbl_amc_2012_mu… N572T            N572      #>  5 Tjc0NFQ6bmJsX2F… Tjc0NDpuYmxfYW1… nbl_amc_2012_mu… N744T            N744      #>  6 TjU2MVQ6bmJsX2F… TjU2MTpuYmxfYW1… nbl_amc_2012_mu… N561T            N561      #>  7 TjU0OFQ6bmJsX2F… TjU0ODpuYmxfYW1… nbl_amc_2012_mu… N548T            N548      #>  8 TjU3MlQ6bmJsX2F… TjU3MjpuYmxfYW1… nbl_amc_2012_mu… N572T            N572      #>  9 TjU3NVQ6bmJsX2F… TjU3NTpuYmxfYW1… nbl_amc_2012_mu… N575T            N575      #> 10 TjUwOFQ6bmJsX2F… TjUwODpuYmxfYW1… nbl_amc_2012_mu… N508T            N508      #> # … with 552 more rows, and 26 more variables: entrezGeneId <int>, #> #   studyId <chr>, center <chr>, Mutation_Status <chr>, validationStatus <chr>, #> #   startPosition <int>, endPosition <int>, referenceAllele <chr>, #> # what: cbioportalR: An R package to access data on cBioPortal — cbioportalR-package
title: cbioportalR: An R package to access data on cBioPortal — cbioportalR-package
text: allows access cBioPortal's genomic clinical data directly R.     package wraps cBioPortal's existing API endpoints R R users can easily leverage cBioPortal's API.     Using functions, can access genomic data mutations, copy number alterations fusions well data tumor mutational burden (TMB),     microsatellite instability status (MSI) select clinical data points (depending study).

title: cbioportalR: An R package to access data on cBioPortal — cbioportalR-package
text: Maintainer: Karissa Whiting karissa.whiting@gmail.com (ORCID) Authors: Axel Martin Arshi Arora

what: Core function to retrieve data from cBioPortal API. — cbp_api
title: Core function to retrieve data from cBioPortal API. — cbp_api
text: Core function retrieve data cBioPortal API.

title: Core function to retrieve data from cBioPortal API. — cbp_api
code: cbp_api(   url_path,   method = c("get", "post"),   token = get_cbioportal_token(),   body = NULL,   extra_box = FALSE )

title: Core function to retrieve data from cBioPortal API. — cbp_api
text: url_path url path API call method API method use. Default GET. token Authentication token, needed. Default get_cbioportal_token() body Arguments passed API call (e.g. sample ID gene IDs) extra_box functions require additional list() wrapping around body idk

title: Core function to retrieve data from cBioPortal API. — cbp_api
text: parsed API response

title: Core function to retrieve data from cBioPortal API. — cbp_api
code: get_cbioportal_db("public") cbp_api(url_path = "genes/TP53") #> Warning: No CBIOPORTAL_TOKEN in `.Renviron`. Try `usethis::edit_r_environ()` to add a token #> $content #> $content$entrezGeneId #> [1] 7157 #>  #> $content$hugoGeneSymbol #> [1] "TP53" #>  #> $content$type #> [1] "protein-coding" #>  #>  #> $path #> [1] "api/genes/TP53" #>  #> $response #> Response [https://www.cbioportal.org/api/genes/TP53] #>   Date: 2022-03-09 16:57 #>   Status: 200 #>   Content-Type: application/json #>   Size: 69 B #>  #>  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "cbp_api"

what: Get copy number alterations by sample ID or study ID — get_cna
title: Get copy number alterations by sample ID or study ID — get_cna
text: Get copy number alterations sample ID study ID

title: Get copy number alterations by sample ID or study ID — get_cna
code: get_cna(sample_id = NULL, study_id = NULL, panel = NULL, genes = NULL)

title: Get copy number alterations by sample ID or study ID — get_cna
text: sample_id character vector sample ids. Can NULL study_id passed. sample IDs passed study_id, IMPACT studies queried default. non IMPACT ID samples passed, study_id required well retrieve data. study_id character vector study IDs. See get_studies() see available studies. passed specified sample_id samples specified studies returned. panel OPTIONAL argument. character vector length 1 indicating specific panel used. NULL, panel looked get_panel() genes panel returned. genes list genes query. default impact genes.

title: Get copy number alterations by sample ID or study ID — get_cna
text: dataframe CNA sample ID (maf file format)

title: Get copy number alterations by sample ID or study ID — get_cna
code: get_cbioportal_db('public') get_cna(sample_id = c("P-0000004-T01-IM3", "P-0000015-T01-IM3")) #> No genes specified by user, so querying curated list of impact genes. #>               To view queried gene list run `cbioportalR::impact_gene_info` #> Warning: If you are an MSK researcher, for most up to date IMPACT data you should connect to MSK cbioportal.  #> This function is using limited public IMPACT data (study_id = 'msk_impact_2017') #> Warning: No CBIOPORTAL_TOKEN in `.Renviron`. Try `usethis::edit_r_environ()` to add a token #> # A tibble: 14 × 9 #>    uniqueSampleKey          uniquePatientKey molecularProfil… sampleId patientId #>    <chr>                    <chr>            <chr>            <chr>    <chr>     #>  1 UC0wMDAwMDA0LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDA0Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000004 #>  2 UC0wMDAwMDA0LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDA0Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000004 #>  3 UC0wMDAwMDA0LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDA0Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000004 #>  4 UC0wMDAwMDE1LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDE1Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000015 #>  5 UC0wMDAwMDE1LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDE1Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000015 #>  6 UC0wMDAwMDE1LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDE1Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000015 #>  7 UC0wMDAwMDE1LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDE1Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000015 #>  8 UC0wMDAwMDE1LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDE1Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000015 #>  9 UC0wMDAwMDE1LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDE1Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000015 #> 10 UC0wMDAwMDE1LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDE1Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000015 #> 11 UC0wMDAwMDE1LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDE1Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000015 #> 12 UC0wMDAwMDE1LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDE1Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000015 #> 13 UC0wMDAwMDE1LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDE1Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000015 #> 14 UC0wMDAwMDE1LVQwMS1JTTM… UC0wMDAwMDE1Om1… msk_impact_2017… P-00000… P-0000015 #> # … with 4 more variables: entrezGeneId <int>, studyId <chr>, alteration <int>, #> #   Hugo_Symbol <chr>

what: Get all genetic data for a study or list of IDs — get_genetics
title: Get all genetic data for a study or list of IDs — get_genetics
text: Get genetic data study list IDs

title: Get all genetic data for a study or list of IDs — get_genetics
code: get_genetics(   sample_ids = NULL,   study_id = NULL,   genes = NULL,   panel = NULL,   mutations = TRUE,   fusions = TRUE,   cna = TRUE )

title: Get all genetic data for a study or list of IDs — get_genetics
text: sample_ids character vector sample ids. Can NULL study_id passed. sample IDs passed study_id, IMPACT studies queried default. non IMPACT ID samples passed, study_id required well retrieve data. study_id character vector study IDs. See get_studies() see available studies. passed specified sample_id samples specified studies returned. genes vector Entrez IDs genes query. default impact genes. panel OPTIONAL argument. character vector length 1 indicating specific panel used. NULL, panel looked get_panel() genes panel returned. mutations Boolean specifying mutation data fetched. Default TRUE. fusions Boolean specifying fusion data fetched. Default TRUE. cna Boolean specifying cna data fetched. Default TRUE.

title: Get all genetic data for a study or list of IDs — get_genetics
text: list dataframes containing genetic data.

title: Get all genetic data for a study or list of IDs — get_genetics
code: get_cbioportal_db("public") get_genetics(sample_id = c("P-0005217-T03-IM5", "P-0038798-T01-IM6")) #> No genes specified by user, so querying curated list of impact genes. #>               To view queried gene list run `cbioportalR::impact_gene_info` #> Warning: If you are an MSK researcher, for most up to date IMPACT data you should connect to MSK cbioportal.  #> This function is using limited public IMPACT data (study_id = 'msk_impact_2017') #> Warning: No CBIOPORTAL_TOKEN in `.Renviron`. Try `usethis::edit_r_environ()` to add a token #> No genes specified by user, so querying curated list of impact genes. #>               To view queried gene list run `cbioportalR::impact_gene_info` #> Warning: If you are an MSK researcher, for most up to date IMPACT data you should connect to MSK cbioportal.  #> This function is using limited public IMPACT data (study_id = 'msk_impact_2017') #> Warning: No CBIOPORTAL_TOKEN in `.Renviron`. text: sample_id character vector sample ids. Can NULL study_id passed. sample IDs passed study_id, IMPACT studies queried default. non IMPACT ID samples passed, study_id required well retrieve data. study_id character vector study IDs. code: impact_gene_info

title: IMPACT Gene Meta Data — impact_gene_info
text: data frame 470 genes hugo_symbol Factor w/ 574 levels, Column containing HUGO symbols genes included IMPACT entrez_id Integer, contains Entrez IDs genes included IMPACT platform_341 Character, indicates whether gene included IMPACT platform 341. Options included included platform_410 Character, indicates whether gene included IMPACT platform 410. Options included included platform_468 Character, indicates whether gene included IMPACT platform 468. Options included included alias nested dataframe aliases gene corresponding entrez gene ids aliases exist
